longBusinessSummary: Vibra Energia S.A. manufactures, processes, distributes, trades in, transports, imports, and exports oil-based products, lubricants, and other fuels. The company also produces, distributes, trades in, and transports various energy forms and chemical products. It operates in Retail and B2B segments. The company markets its oil products, lubricants, compressed natural gas, biofuels, and convenience store products. It also markets oil-based fuels and lubricants and provides associated services to its consumer's market, as well as markets aviation products and services at Brazil's airport facilities. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
